name: Chapter IV
tooltip:
Chapter IV

Bring pages 25, 26, and 27 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter IV.

Requirements:
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 25
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 26
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 27
